== Nodoka Dust ==

A refeshing look to one of the most popular Ubuntu themes created.  There are several new features in the Nodoka engine created by Daniel Geiger and Martin Sourada.  The buttons and progressbar shadows have a smoother and dimensional feel.  The gradients are also more apparent.  Dotted focus lines are also gone.  There are three new styles to the engine including (CLASSIC, MODERN, and GLOSSY).  

=== Concept ===
Add a newer dimension to an already phenomenal theme created by Rico Sta. Cruz and Ricardo (Kido) Mariano III. This theme is early in development and will need heavy testing do the incompatibility with darker themes. 

*** '''Nodoka Engine:''' This theme is based on the development version of nodoka.
